quizDescription.text:
download and install R for free from the following webpage:
http://www.cran.r-project.org
At the top of the page, select your operating system (Linux, Windows, or Mac) and then follow the instructions.

For most Windows users, you will select "install R for the first time" and then select "Download R 3.2.0 for Windows" at the top of the page.
For Mac users, you will want to download R-3.2.0.pkg if you have OS X 10.9 (mavericks) or higher installed and R-3.1.3-snowleopard.pkg for earlier versions of the operating system

questions.questionText: Summarize the Download and Install R
